settlement castle
{
	level large_town
	region Pamplona_Province

	year_founded 0
	population 2500
	plan_set default_set
	faction_creator aragon

settlement
{
	level town
	region Turku_Province; Vrhbosna, Bosnia Province

	year_founded 0
	population 1900
	plan_set default_set
	faction_creator hungary
	building
	{
		type core_building wooden_pallisade
	}
	building
	{
		type barracks town_watch
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_roads roads
	}
	building
	{
		type market corn_exchange
	}
}

{
	level town

	{
		type core_building wooden_pallisade
	}
	building
	{
		type barracks town_watch
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_roads roads
	}
	building
	{
		type market corn_exchange
	}
}
